Returns the number of `Unicode.Scalar`s skipped over, which can be 0 if at the start of the UTF8Span.

# skipBack()

**Instance Method**

Move `codeUnitOffset` to the start of the previous scalar, without decoding it.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func skipBack() -> Int
```

## Discussion

Returns the number of `Unicode.Scalar`s skipped over, which can be 0 if at the start of the UTF8Span.
title: skipBack()
